I

IBallCmd - Interface in model
Interface that represents commands sent through the dispatcher to process the balls
image - Variable in class model.paint.ImagePaintStrategy
The image to paint
imageObs - Variable in class model.paint.ImagePaintStrategy
ImageObserver needed for some image operations
ImagePaintStrategy - Class in model.paint
Paint strategy that paints an image from a file, scaled to the host Ball's radius.
ImagePaintStrategy(String, double) - Constructor for class model.paint.ImagePaintStrategy
Constructor that takes the image filename and fill factor.
ImagePaintStrategy(AffineTransform, String, double) - Constructor for class model.paint.ImagePaintStrategy
Constructor that takes an external AffineTransform, the filename of the image to paint and a fill factor of the image.
IModelControlAdapter<TStrategyDropListItem,TPaintDropListItem> - Interface in view
An interface that defines an adapter that the view uses to communicate with the model.
IModelUpdateAdapter - Interface in view
An interface that defines an adapter that the view uses to update the model.
increasing - Variable in class model.strategy.BreathingStrategy
If the radius should be incremented or decremented.
init(Ball) - Method in interface model.IPaintStrategy
Initializes the given ball.
init(Ball) - Method in class model.paint.ADecoratorPaintStrategy
Default behavior is to simply delegate to the decoree's init method
init(Ball) - Method in class model.paint.APaintStrategy
By default, do nothing for initialization.
init(Ball) - Method in class model.paint.ImagePaintStrategy
Initializes the internal ImageObserver reference from the host Ball Also calculates the net scale factor for the image.
init(Ball) - Method in class model.paint.MultiplePaintStrategy
Delegates to all the IPaintStrategies in the composite.
init(Ball) - Method in class model.paint.strategy.BallPaintStrategy
By default, do nothing for initialization.
init(Ball) - Method in class model.paint.strategy.SquarePaintStrategy
By default, do nothing for initialization.
initGUI() - Method in class view.BallWorldView
GUI initialization function
inputPanel - Variable in class view.BallWorldView
 
IPaintStrategy - Interface in model
Top-level interface that represents a strategy used by a Ball when asked to perform variant paint operations.
IPaintStrategyFac - Interface in model
An interface that defines a factory that instantiates a specific IPaintStrategy
IRandomizer - Interface in util
An random generator interface that generates random values of various types.
IShapeFactory - Interface in model.paint.shape
Abstract factory that creates a Shape for use as prototype shapes in IPaintStrategies.
IUpdateStrategy - Interface in model.strategy
Define an interface to update the state of balls.
IUpdateStrategyFac - Interface in model.strategy
Defines an interface that create concrete instances of IUpdateStrategy.
IViewUpdateAdapter - Interface in model
An interface that defines an adapter that the model uses to update the view.
